description:
Welcome to my "Revolutionary Fast Track Arithmetic Course". This course has been meticulously designed over the course of many years specially for those student who find it hard to complete Quantitative tests in given stipulated time.

This Exam Oriented course has been be specially designed after intensive research keeping in mind the requirements of students for various exams.

I have adopted a new easy to Understand Layout for this course. Each Chapter will have an "Introduction" followed by a detailed "Descriptive Section" and then ends with most important section "Fast Track Section" which provide students with some invaluable tricks and shortcut techniques to help them solve same problems much faster compared to traditional methods.

Important Notice : Many More Sections to be Uploaded in coming weeks - Stay tuned !!

Sections to be added

1. Number System - Done
2. HCF and LCM - Done
3. Square and Cube Roots : Will be Uploaded before 20th Nov.
4. Simplification of complex mathematical Operations - Will be uploaded before 30th Nov.
5. Average - Will be uploaded before 30th Nov.
6. Percentage - Will be uploaded before 30th Nov.
7. Simple and Compound Interest - Will be uploaded before 15th Dec.
8. Profit and Loss - Will be uploaded before 15th Dec.

Regular Discussions and Quizzes will be held regularly every month.
title: A basic Arithmetic Course
